name: PopHero
description:
This is my submission for : Minijam 84 Bubbles where your ammo is you!

This may just be my most ambitious game yet! I have doubled down even more hours that usual and tried something very different than what I would usually make.

I am hoping that the game has no bugs, there is a save feature so you can come back at any time to run the endless mode! :)

Endless mode has a lot more secrets and features than the tutorial. I hope you have a lot of fun playing this. 

Werq by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4616-werq
